{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=Lyra |revision=Trio (MAP-AC1750) |series=AC1750 |asin=B07C4CM65G |newegg=N82E16833320363 |price=299 |est_release_date=01/08/2018 |fcc_date=01/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |availability=now |type=wireless system, mesh node, |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACRW00 |ic_id=3568A-RTACRW00 |pcb_id=1246-01000238-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563 |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25645GM2I-08G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6SB-25 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8334 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85330-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85746-11;;3; ,,, Bluetooth 4.0 + HS Chip;Atheros;AR3012;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Alexa, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.3.8; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.72.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3-stream 802.11ac device (433 Mbps per stream), :• '''450''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System}} ''AiProtection network security powered by Trend Micro,'' :''Parental Controls, Works with Amazon Alexa'' [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Trio/ Product page] (3x pack) {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=Lyra-Trio}} :Web GUI: http://router.asus.com "1246-01000238-50Z" is silkscreened on the main board. {{see also|ASUS MAP-AC1750|Edimax}} *[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Android ASUS Lyra App v1.0.0.0.20 :Compatibility Models: :*[[ASUS Lyra]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC2200]]) :*[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC1300]]) :*[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC1750]]) :*[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] ([[ASUS MAP-AC3000]]) {{FCC ST|07/18/2018|indexme.}} ===Overview=== *'''Banish WiFi Dead Zone''' - Dual band, tri-hub mesh wifi system with unique antenna :placement delivers strong WiFi to every corner of your home *'''Fast & Smooth Connections, Always''' - 3x3 MIMO technology and seamless roaming :deliver superior WiFi speed and connect you to best signal, anywhere in home *'''Always Up-to-date Protection''' - The lifetime free cloud-based security powered :by Trend Micro makes sure your privacy on connected devices is protected *'''Parental Controls''' - Website filters and scheduling allow you to protect your :family from inappropriate content and unhealthy Internet usage behavior *'''You’re in Control''' - The ASUS Lyra app enables PC-free setup, network :management and diagnostics, and notifies you about any problems ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33202-asus-lyra-trio-reviewed ''ASUS Lyra Trio Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-lyra-trio-review ''ASUS Lyra Trio Reviewed'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===News=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family ''CES 2018 - ASUS Lyra Home Wi-Fi System'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://edgeup.asus.com/2018/lyra-voice-lyra-trio-bring-alexa-functionality-affordable-flexibility-to-your-mesh-network/ ''Lyra Voice and Lyra Trio'' on '''EdgeUp ASUS'''] ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
############################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros platform, linux-3.3.8
# SOC: QCA9557, QCA956X
# Qualcomm Atheros big-endian MIPS platform, linux-3.3.8

export MAP-AC1750 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y SSH=y MIPS32=r2 QCA=y QCA956X=y 
 PARENTAL2=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y EMAIL=y YANDEXDNS=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y EBTABLES=y 
 AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="MAP-AC1750" MAPAC1750=y NVRAM_64K=y TUNEK="n" 
 OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y DEBUGFS=y CFGSYNC=y 
 USB="USB" XHCI=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y WLCEVENTD=y \
	JFFS2=y WPSMULTIBAND=y ART2=y BLINK_LED=y \
	BT_CONN=y DETWAN=y SINGLE_SSID=y SSID_AMAPS=y \
	QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y STAINFO=y JFFS2USERICON=y MESH=y \
	NATNL_AIHOME=y WIFICLONE=y QCA_VAP_LOCALMAC=y PSISTLOG=y 
        LYRA_HIDE=y DUAL_BACKHAUL=n
}} ===See also=== *[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker'' __NOTOC__
